channel.title: Trying to run Rune-Evo but always get error_game_js5connect
channel.description:
If anyone knows the fix to this i would greatly appreciate it, its just rune-evo's source that i cant play on, matrix 718 works fine. Every client i have downloaded has the same error (error_game_js5connect) and all these clients run with matrix just fine. This is why i think its the source and not the client i could be wrong sorry if i post in the wrong section.
Thanks

item.title: Trying to run Rune-Evo but always get error_game_js5connect
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

be sure to set your ip to 127.0.0.1 or your own ip if you portforwarded
you can change the ips in loader.java(client)

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to run Rune-Evo but always get error_game_js5connect

item.title: Trying to run Rune-Evo but always get error_game_js5connect
item.dc:creator: @xhar xhar
item.description:
@xhar wrote:

make sure you rune the source first and let the source load then run the client
